entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
